pullrequest.title: Disable all jobs for ign-gazebo and ign-launch on Windows

content.raw: Is this "disabling" the jobs, or "removing" the jobs? I think it's helpful for them to exist so we can test, but they could be disabled as they're now (see [this](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ign_gazebo-ign-3-win/) for example). I manually disabled them through the UI though, so I don't know if that's persistent.
content.html: Is this "disabling" the jobs, or "removing" the jobs? I think it's helpful for them to exist so we can test, but they could be disabled as they're now (see this for example). I manually disabled them through the UI though, so I don't know if that's persistent.
